pageContext.title: Shakespeare Quartos Archive
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Shakespeare Quartos Archive is a digital collection of pre-1642 editions of William Shakespeare's plays. A cross-Atlantic collaboration has produced an interactive interface for the detailed study of these geographically distant quartos, with full functionality for all thirty-two quarto copies of Hamlet held by participating institutions.
pageContext.participants: Beth Bonsignore, Doug Reside, Elisabeth Kvernen, Grant Dickie, Jim Kuhn, Michael Popham, Neil Fraistat, Richard Kuhta, Richard Ovenden
